original_text: He watches the way that each person lives. He sees what they do every day. He watches the way that each person lives. He sees what they do every day. He watches the way that each person lives. He sees what they do every day. He watches the way that each person lives. He sees what they do every day. He watches the way that each person lives.
korean_text: 그는 사람의 길을 주목하시며 사람의 모든 걸음을 감찰하시나니
